about.title: Welcome to Xavi Renovaties
about.description: Xavi Renovaties has been in business for many years and makes your renovation wishes come true. We always say: Quality is the pride of craftsmanship. We put the customer first, actively listening to your wishes and providing you with appropriate professional advice on the project to be carried out. Our business activities consist of renovation and maintenance work. You can contact us for renovation and maintenance work of any nature and size. Xavi Renovations works with a permanent team that includes various specialists.

process.title: Our process in Xavi Renovaties
process.description: If you are thinking of renovating, you have come to the right place! Xavi Renovatie will have a conversation with you in which we will clearly identify and describe your wishes.
process.first: We will have a conversation with you in which we will clearly identify and describe your wishes.
process.second: The team creates an adequate and professional advice in a renovation plan.
process.third: All work and costs can be planned based on the renovation plan
process.fourth: After the client's approval, the renovation will start.

home3.title: Interior Design and Renovation Projects.
home3.text1: XaviRenovaties is a consolidated company in the sector of integral reform for several years. Specialised and dedicated to the renovation of all types of homes, interior projects, premises, villas, warehouses, garages and homeowners' associations.
home3.text2: Ready to start your next project? Contact us and let's make your vision a reality today.
home3.text3: From the beginning you will have a personalised treatment in which we will sit down together to give shape to your dream idea.

home2.title: Discover our works and designs.
home2.text: In every project and renovation, we create environments that reflect your style and personality. From interior design to complete renovations, our team is dedicated to bringing your ideas to life. Discover how our projects stand out for their innovation and functionality. With a unique approach to every detail, we create spaces that inspire and transform. Explore our work and let yourself be carried away by creativity.

design.title: Customized designs
design.text: If you wish, we can also offer you the possibility to visualize how your design would look like on a model or we can even propose ideas for your renovation. We use a digital tool with which we can carry out your idea to see if it is what you are looking for in your ideal reform.
